responces: Hello! How can I assist you today?
Hi! Looking to book an appointment or a test?
Hey! What do you need help with?

patterns: I want to book an appointment with a doctor
responces: Sure! Which specialist would you like to see? We have Physician, Gynecologist, Dermatologist, Pediatricians, Neurologist, and Gastroenterologist. Here checkout our experianced doctors : [Doctors](http://localhost:5173/doctor)

patterns: I need to book a CT Scan
I want to do an Ultrasound
Can I get a body test?
Help me schedule a medical test
responces: Sure. What kind of test would you like to book: CT Scan, X-Ray, MRI, or Ultrasound?. Please select a test type and a convenient time. [Book now]()
I can help you book doctor appointments and schedule diagnostic tests like MRI, CT Scan, and more.
You can ask me to book a doctor's appointment or schedule a lab test.
Let me know if you need anything else.

patterns: I want to cancle my appointments
responces: Yes, you can cancle your appointments just navigate to: [My appointments]() and press cancle

patterns: How can I change my password
responces: No problem you can update your password using your email [chick here]()

patterns: Will I get a refund if a cancle my appointment
responces: Yes, you will get a refund if you cancle your appointment

patterns: I think I have the flu
I feel tired all the time
responses: You should see a General Physician for these symptoms. Book here: [Book Now](http://localhost:5173/doctor/Physician)
You should consult a Gynecologist. Book here: [Book Now](http://localhost:5173/doctor/Gynecologist)
You might need a Dermatologist for these symptoms. Book here: [Book Now](http://localhost:5173/doctor/Dermatologist)

patterns: My baby is crying a lot
responses: Please consult a Pediatrician for your child's symptoms. Book here: [Book Now](http://localhost:5173/doctor/Pediatricians)

patterns: I feel numbness in my limbs
I think I have a neurological issue
responses: You should consult a Neurologist. Book here: [Book Now](http://localhost:5173/doctor/Neurologist)
For digestive and stomach-related issues, a Gastroenterologist is recommended. Book here: [Book Now](http://localhost:5173/doctor/Gastroenterologist)
